first.title: Who we are?
first.description:
We are a small chocolate company located in Zagreb, Croatia
Our chocolates are made with the finest Belgian ingredients and melted on perfect temperatures
Decorated with your own personalized photos and logos.
second.title: How do we make them?
second.description:
Chocologo chocolates are made by hand in combination with modern 3D technology.
The final product is wholy made without use of artificial coloring
We use high quality Italian milk and dark chocolate in combination with white chocolate.
